videos.headline: Peters scrambles into the end zone for the Illini TD
videos.description: Illinois quarterback Brandon Peters keeps the ball and finds the end zone for the touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Peters scrambles into the end zone for the Illini TD) 2019/08/31
